mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_TABLE (USER_ID, NAME, EMAIL, "ROLE", LOGIN_TYPE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES(#{email}, #{name}, #{email}, #{role}, #{loginType}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT s.SIGUNGU_ID FROM SIGUNGU s JOIN SIDO si ON s.SIDO_ID = si.SIDO_ID WHERE si.SIDO_NAME LIKE CONCAT(#{sidoName}, '%') AND s.SIGUNGU_NAME = #{sigunguName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUSINESS_USER (USER_ID, BUSINESS_REG_NO, STORE_NAME, ADDRESS, SIGUNGU_ID) VALUES (#{userId}, #{businessRegNo}, #{storeName}, #{address}, #{sigunguId})
mapper.select: SELECT TERMS_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, IS_REQUIRED, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM TERMS
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TERMS_AGREEMENT (USER_ID, TERMS_ID, IS_AGREE, CREATED_AT) VALUES (#{userId}, 4, #{isAgree}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_TABLE SET PHONE_NUMBER = COALESCE(NULLIF(#{phoneNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ''), PHONE_NUMBER), EMAIL = COALESCE(NULLIF(#{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ''), EMAIL), UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE TERMS_AGREEMENT SET IS_AGREE = COALESCE(NULLIF(#{isAgree, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ''), IS_AGREE) WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
